oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Mrs. E. E. Russell from her mother
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. Elizabeth "Eva" Russell was married to Thomas H. Russell, a Methodist minister who served various East Tennessee churches. In this letter her mother, Sarah H. Williamson, described the health of various family members, including Eva's brother, Tom, who had served as a private in Co. K, 2nd Tenn. Cav., CSA. She reported that John O. Cannon had gotten a substitute and had returned home.
